description: Adding canned pumpkin and spices to these waffles gives them a wonderfully autumnal taste.
name: Pumpkin & Cinnamon Waffles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, use a balloon whisk to mix the flour, brown sugar, baking powder, and cinnamon.

Whisk together the egg yolks, milk, vanilla extract, melted butter, and pumpkin purée. Using a clean whisk, whisk the egg whites to firm peaks. Stir the pumpkin mixture into the flour mixture until evenly combined.

Preheat the waffle maker or waffle iron, and oil it if that is suitable for the model you own. Gently fold the egg whites into the batter until they are well combined. Spoon a ladleful of the batter onto the hot waffle ironand spread it almost to the edge. Close the lid and bake until golden.
Serve immediately with maple syrup, apple wedges, or sliced bananas.
